title: VicManton
author: VicManton
content: The regulations in cryptocurrency trading have seemed to be at its peak again. Just recently, Cash Bank has announced its banning all cryptocurrency-related payments starting October 16th. How will crypto traders in this region continue to cope and trade well after the suspension?Please someone should share with me their thoughts, I'm an active trader that makes a living from it.https://www.coinpedia.org/news/chase-bank-takes-a-stance-no-more-crypto-payments-for-uk-clients/amp

comments.author: Iamcrypticguy
comments.body: It's a shame that they have to halt crypto-related transactions, but according to the article you shared, they advised users to look for alternatives. I'll suggest you explore P2P services of compliance-savvy platforms like Bitget. I'm sure you'll find it to be a good alternative.

comments.author: Zee27
comments.body: There are other options they should consider to make crypto related transactions with. I'm certain there are other crypto-friendly banks out there. Revolut is one of such.
